div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 38 Corfu (anc. Corcyra), 1914 (265) Burial: 5th cent. B.C. (Oeconomides) Contents: 12 AR. From excavations Corcyra: st. Disposition: Athens Information from M. Oeconomides The bronze coins listed by Noe are excava- tion finds, not a hd.
